title: Twentyonepaylots
author: Twentyonepaylots
content: I bet on this game on live, Mavs + 19.5, surely won this after a 30-0 run in the 4th quarter.  They made an unbelievable run and tied the game from 111 -87 to 111 - 117, leaving OKC scoreless for the past 6 minutes. Gives me a smirk and goosebumps because of my points plus, but what left me in disbelief is that an NBA team hasn't scored in 6 minutes. What do you guys think about this one? quite sus for me

comments.author: marbet85
comments.body: Quote from: Twentyonepaylots on December 05, 2023, 05:43:49 PMI bet on this game on live, Mavs + 19.5, surely won this after a 30-0 run in the 4th quarter.  They made an unbelievable run and tied the game from 111 -87 to 111 - 117, leaving OKC scoreless for the past 6 minutes. Gives me a smirk and goosebumps because of my points plus, but what left me in disbelief is that an NBA team hasn't scored in 6 minutes. What do you guys think about this one? quite sus for me Yes, that was amazing feat, but I remember the match, Golden vs. Dallas, two years ago, where Golden didn't score a point for 9m 38sec! After check was run 28-0 for Dallas, which is simply impossible with Curry in starting 5!
